name: CLE - Cuarenta - 50 x 5 Robusto
additionalNotes: CLE Cuarenta was developed to celebrate Christian Eiroaâ€™s 40th birthday. And celebrate it does, thanks to a gorgeous Habano-seed wrapper overtop a flavorful blend of aged long-fillers grown throughout Honduras. The cigar is mellow yet bursting with character. Medium in body, each expertly crafted vitola issues a deep, toasty bouquet offering sweet cedar, earth, a touch of coffee bean, and a hint of spice on the long finish. Supremely complex, in true Eiroa fashion, yet silky smooth and tame from start to finish.
